name: My Little Car Wash - Cars & Trucks Roleplaying Game for Kids
name_original: My Little Car Wash - Cars & Trucks Roleplaying Game for Kids
description:
The ultimate car game for little car fans and children! Become the boss of your own car wash and clean a variety of different vehicles. Use a variety of fun washing tools and remove the dirt from the cars.

Featuring a lot of dirty cars, real water physics and a lot of funny car wash tools to clean the cars.
Kids will experience funny 2D animations, music, sounds and illustrations.

You also can mix your own soap in your washing laboratory.

Children learn how to use the mouse in a playful way and also learn logical thinking, hand-eye coordination and of course economic thinking, because after all they are rewarded with success by washing the vehicles.

Who knows... maybe My little Car Wash is the beginning of a great entrepreneurial career and the beginning of a car wash tycoon.

Get the fun car game now!

Your McPeppergames team
